item.title: 【Requests】[REQ CAP] - No Rap Versions
item.description:
Hi everyone,

I've been looking for the No Rap/Solo Versions of several songs. I'll take mp3 or FLAC.

"Knock You Down" by Keri Hilson & Ne-Yo. I heard a No Rap Version that removed Kanye's verse and kept the original album version's ending. I heard it once on WPLJ 95.5 radio (now defunct).

"Tonight I'm Lovin' You" by Enrique Iglesias. The No Rap Version has a bridge that goes "go baby go" if I remember.

"Talk Dirty" by Jason Derulo. The No Rap Version with the Sax Bridge. I've been searching for it for a long time.

"Lose Control" by Keri Hilson. Does anyone have a version without Nelly?

Thank you! Much appreciated.
item.author: pwner14
